name: BottomAppBar
desc: A container that is typically used with [Scaffold.bottomNavigationBar].

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: The amount of space to surround the child inside the bounds of the [BottomAppBar].

fields.name: color
fields.desc: The bottom app bar's background color.

fields.name: elevation
fields.desc: The z-coordinate at which to place this bottom app bar relative to its parent.

fields.name: shape
fields.desc: The notch that is made for the floating action button.

fields.name: notchMargin
fields.desc: The margin between the [FloatingActionButton] and the [BottomAppBar]'s notch.

fields.name: surfaceTintColor
fields.desc: A custom color for the Material 3 surface-tint elevation effect.

fields.name: shadowColor
fields.desc: The color of the shadow below the app bar.

fields.name: height
fields.desc: The double value used to indicate the height of the [BottomAppBar].
